name: Escape (itch) (Key-Djar)
description:
A fun game where you have to escape the game!

Do NOT think your computer crashed, you just picked the wrong way.

A game with over 30 challenges and a lot of fun

In every challenge you have to try to escape and go to the next challenge

There are lots of simple levels, but also a lot of hard ones, where you have to try multiple times and die multiple times for understanding the secret behind the challenge

When you die, in the beginning, you will 'respawn' to the main screen and you'll have to do everything over again.

When you're further in the game and you die, you will have to do a few challenges over again.

check out my other games: https://key-djar.itch.io/
